Name: Standard Carrier Alpha Code
Remarks: P0102: If either MS2-01 or MS2-02 is present, then the other is required

Name: Equipment Number
Notes: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Name: Equipment Description Code
Notes: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment
Remarks: MS203 identifies the type for the equipment specified in MS202.

Name: Equipment Number Check Digit
Notes: Number which designates the check digit applied to a piece of equipment
Remarks: C0402: If MS2-04 is present, then MS2-02 is required
